txt.en: 'Well! You have returned without being gored. Hopefully the madness of Brundurch has perished along with the Great Boar.'
Linnet is located in central Wildwood.\n\nYou should talk to Linnet Redholm.
Something has driven the Great Boar Brundurch to feats of violence and terror.
Brundurch the Great Boar can be found in the northern Wildwood.\n\nLinnet has asked you to defeat the maddened boar, Brundurch.

'There are many dangerous things in the Wildwood, but folk speak of Brundurch the Great Boar in nervous, hushed tones. Some say his madness was brought on by the frothing sickness. Others insist there is a darkness in the Wildwood itself that slowly twists the creatures within.\n\n'Either way, Brundurch is vicious and responsible for attacking more than one group of merchants who have tried to make their way through the Wildwood. The Great Boar must be stopped, lest he spread his madness or do any more harm.'
